languages.text: {n}Суккуба рядом с Назракеем обращает взгляд к вам.{/n} "Эзирраеш предали и оскорбили свой кабал. Одна — своей непочтительностью и слабостью. Второй — своим жалким спектаклем на Обсидиановом суде и союзом с мон-кай. Зваться Опустошительной бурей отныне — оскорблять себя. Его бывшим членам есть путь либо в смерть, либо в полон иного господина. И архонт Назракей даровал этим ничтожествам, некогда служившим Эзирраеш, свою милость".

traits.locale_text: {n}Суккуба рядом с Назракеем обращает взгляд к вам.{/n} "Маражай Эзирраэш предал и оскорбил свой кабал. Убив архонта — оставил без чести. Став союзником мон-кай — растоптал остатки репутации. Зваться Опустошительной бурей отныне — оскорблять себя. Ни один друкари больше не смеет причислять себя к этому кругу. И архонт Назракей даровал этим ничтожествам свою милость".
traits.speaker: Sinistroia

languages.text: {n}The Succubus next to Nazrakhei looks at you.{/n} "The Aezyrraesh betrayed and offended their Kabal. One by her weakness and irreverence, the other by his pathetic performance at the Obsidian Court and an alliance with the mon-keigh. To call oneself of the Reaving Tempest these days is to be dishonoured. Its former members may pass into death or into servitude to a different master. Archon Nazrakhei granted his favour to the scum who once served the Aezyrraesh."
languages.original_text: {n}Суккуба рядом с Назракеем обращает взгляд к вам.{/n} "Эзирраеш предали и оскорбили свой кабал. Одна — своей непочтительностью и слабостью. Второй — своим жалким спектаклем на Обсидиановом суде и союзом с мон-кай. Зваться Опустошительной бурей отныне — оскорблять себя. Его бывшим членам есть путь либо в смерть, либо в полон иного господина. И архонт Назракей даровал этим ничтожествам, некогда служившим Эзирраеш, свою милость".

To call oneself of the Reaving Tempest these days is to besmirch yourself. Its former members may pass into death or into servitude to a different master. Archon Nazrakhei granted his favour to the lowlifes who once served the Aezyrraesh."

languages.text: {n}Der Succubus neben Nazrakhei blickt dich an.{/n} "Die Aezyrraesh haben ihre Kabale verraten und beleidigt. Eine durch ihre Schwäche und Respektlosigkeit, der andere durch seine erbärmliche Leistung vor dem Obsidiangericht und ein Bündnis mit den Chem-Pan-Sey. Wer sich heute Mitglied des plündernden Sturms nennt, der verwirkt jede Ehre. Die ehemaligen Mitglieder dürfen in den Tod übergehen oder in die Knechtschaft eines anderen Meisters. Archon Nazrakhei hat dem Abschaum, der den Aezyrraesh einst gedient hat, seine Gunst gewährt."
languages.original_text: {n}The Succubus next to Nazrakhei looks at you.{/n} "The Aezyrraesh betrayed and offended their Kabal. One by her weakness and irreverence, the other by his pathetic performance at the Obsidian Court and an alliance with the mon-keigh. To call oneself of the Reaving Tempest these days is to be dishonoured. Its former members may pass into death or into servitude to a different master. Archon Nazrakhei granted his favour to the scum who once served the Aezyrraesh."

Archon Nazrakhei hat dem Abschaum, der den Aezyrraesh einst gedient hat, seine Gunst gewährt."
traits.speaker: Sinistroia

languages.text: {n}纳札骸身边的血腥魔女看着你。{/n}“艾泽拉什家族的人背叛了自己的阴谋团，冒犯了所有人。其中一个软弱而傲慢，而另一个在黑曜王庭之中献丑，还和猴子结成了联盟。如今，所有自称狂风阴谋团的人只会招来唾弃。它的成员要么死了，要么被别的主人奴役。而现在，纳札骸执政官非常慷慨，将他的恩惠赐予了那些曾为艾泽拉什家族服务的渣滓。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Succubus next to Nazrakhei looks at you.{/n} "The Aezyrraesh betrayed and offended their Kabal. One by her weakness and irreverence, the other by his pathetic performance at the Obsidian Court and an alliance with the mon-keigh. Archon Nazrakhei granted his favour to the scum who once served the Aezyrraesh."

traits.speaker: Sinistroia

languages.text: {n}La succube à côté de Nazrakhei vous dévisage.{/n} « Les Aezyrraesh ont trahi et insulté leur Kabale. La première par sa faiblesse et son irrévérence, le second par sa pathétique prestation à la Cour d'Obsidienne et une alliance avec les mon-keigh. Se réclamer de la Tempête ravageuse ces jours-ci, c'est se couvrir de déshonneur. Ses anciens membres peuvent mourir ou servir un autre maître. L'archonte Nazrakhei a accordé sa grâce à la racaille qui servait autrefois les Aezyrraesh. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Succubus next to Nazrakhei looks at you.{/n} "The Aezyrraesh betrayed and offended their Kabal. One by her weakness and irreverence, the other by his pathetic performance at the Obsidian Court and an alliance with the mon-keigh. To call oneself of the Reaving Tempest these days is to be dishonoured. Its former members may pass into death or into servitude to a different master. Archon Nazrakhei granted his favour to the scum who once served the Aezyrraesh."

Se réclamer de la Tempête ravageuse ces jours-ci, c'est se couvrir de déshonneur. Ses anciens membres peuvent mourir ou servir un autre maître. L'archonte Nazrakhei a accordé sa grâce à la racaille qui servait autrefois les Aezyrraesh. »
traits.speaker: Sinistroia

languages.text: {n}La súcubo que acompaña a Nazrakhei te mira.{/n} «Los Aezyrraesh traicionaron y ofendieron a su Kábala. Uno por su debilidad e irreverencia, y otro por su patética actuación en el tribunal de obsidiana y su alianza con mon-keigh. Llamarse parte de la Tempestad Asoladora es una deshonra estos días. Sus antiguos miembros pueden morir o cambiar de amos. El Arconte Nazrakhei concedió su favor a la chusma que en su día sirvió a los Aezyrraesh».
languages.original_text: {n}The Succubus next to Nazrakhei looks at you.{/n} "The Aezyrraesh betrayed and offended their Kabal. One by her weakness and irreverence, the other by his pathetic performance at the Obsidian Court and an alliance with the mon-keigh. To call oneself of the Reaving Tempest these days is to be dishonoured. Its former members may pass into death or into servitude to a different master. Archon Nazrakhei granted his favour to the scum who once served the Aezyrraesh."

Sus antiguos miembros pueden morir o cambiar de amos. El Arconte Nazrakhei concedió su favor a la chusma que en su día sirvió a los Aezyrraesh».
traits.speaker: Sinistroia

languages.text: {n}ナズラクヘイの隣にいるサキュバスがあなたを見る。{/n}「アエジレシュは裏切って彼らの陰謀団を怒らせた。一つは彼女の弱さと非礼のせい。もう一つはオブシディア法廷での彼の哀れな振る舞いとモン＝ケイと手を組んだせい。近頃は略奪の嵐を名乗ることは恥と見なされている。以前のメンバーは死んだか、別のマスターの元で奴隷となっている。アーコン・ナズラクヘイは、かつてアエジレシュに仕えていたクズのような奴をかわいがっていた」
languages.original_text: {n}The Succubus next to Nazrakhei looks at you.{/n} "The Aezyrraesh betrayed and offended their Kabal. One by her weakness and irreverence, the other by his pathetic performance at the Obsidian Court and an alliance with the mon-keigh. To call oneself of the Reaving Tempest these days is to be dishonoured. Its former members may pass into death or into servitude to a different master. Archon Nazrakhei granted his favour to the scum who once served the Aezyrraesh."

traits.speaker: Sinistroia

languages.text: {n}Nazrakhei'in yanındaki Sakkubus sana bakıyor.{/n} "Aezyrraesh, Kabal'ına ihanet etti ve onları utandırdı. Bir kere zayıflığı ve saygısızlığıyla, bir kere de Obsidiyen Divan'daki içler acısı performansı ve bu mon-keigh'le ittifak yapmasıyla. Bugünlerde Müfteris Kasırga'dan olduğunu söylemek, onursuzluk demektir. Eski mensuplar ölebilir veya farklı bir efendinin hizmetine girebilirler. Arkon Nazrakhei, bir zamanlar Aezyrraesh'e hizmet eden pisliklere cömertlik ediliyor."
languages.original_text: {n}The Succubus next to Nazrakhei looks at you.{/n} "The Aezyrraesh betrayed and offended their Kabal. One by her weakness and irreverence, the other by his pathetic performance at the Obsidian Court and an alliance with the mon-keigh. To call oneself of the Reaving Tempest these days is to be dishonoured. Its former members may pass into death or into servitude to a different master. Archon Nazrakhei granted his favour to the scum who once served the Aezyrraesh."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nazrakhei'in yanındaki Sakkubus sana bakıyor.{/n} "Aezyrraesh, Kabal'ına ihanet etti ve onları utandırdı. Bir kere zayıflığı ve saygısızlığıyla, bir kere de Obsidiyen Divan'daki içler acısı performansı ve bu mon-keigh'le ittifak yapmasıyla. Bugünlerde Müfteris Kasırga'dan olduğunu söylemek onursuzluk demek. Eski üyeler ölebilir veya farklı bir efendinin hizmetine girebilirler. Arkon Nazrakhei, bir zamanlar Aezyrraesh'e hizmet eden pisliklere cömertlikte bulunuyor."
traits.speaker: Sinistroia
